initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Elite360?
The customer service feature and training package has been amazing as we begin this new implementation.

What do you dislike about Elite360?
So far, we have not come across any dislikes at this stage in our implementation.

What problems is Elite360 solving and how is that benefiting you?
Elite360 is allowing us to increase a d streamline our productivity as compared to before we started.
